name: Minigame Meltdown
description:
A small, comedic game that teaches you the valuable lesson that you shouldn't try to build an experimental nuclear reactor in your kitchen with supplies from your local hardware store. Let's just hope your radiation suit is higher-quality than your equipment.

Everything is controlled using WASD and Space.

Spaghetti code and questionable art by GalladeGuy

SFX and Music from https://www.zapsplat.com

Cool pixel font from https://www.1001fonts.com/thirteen-pixel-fonts-font.html
